wikipedia_page.main: Constance Mary Monks (20 May 1911 – 4 February 1989), JP, OBE, née Green, was a British Conservative Party politician and teacher. She was also a partner with her husband in a newspaper business.

link_mentions.page: List of MPs elected in the 1970 United Kingdom general election

response: At the 1970 general election, Kenyon retired; his seat went to the Conservative candidate Constance Monks.
